content:
Trang Bui I am a third-year PhD student in Statistics at University of Waterloo. My PhD projects focus on problems in the field of Experimental Design and Network Statistiscs. My advisors are Professor Stefan Steiner and Professor Nathaniel Stevens.
Research interest: Network Statistics, Experimental Design, Meta Analysis, and Statistical Learning.
I am also working as a Teaching Assistant at Department of Statistics and Actuarial Sciences and a Consultant for Statistical Consulting and Collaborative Research Unit at University of Waterloo. I completed my undergraduate studies with Double Majors in Mathematical Sciences and Business Manangement at Korean Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST).
